about_the_game:
Greetings Bloomtowners!

Dive into the cozy Bloomtown neighborhoods or the dark Underside with our exclusive Supporter Pack.
It includes the superb OST with 14 tracks as well as two artworks which can be used as desktop background if you choose to go the extra mile in supporting us.
We'd like to express our gratitude to everyone who decides to purchase it, your generosity is truly appreciated.

The playlist is a mixed of chilled tracks from Bloomtown suitable for studying/relaxing, but most importantly the empowering combat tracks perfect for slaying demons!

The beautiful pixel artworks have been made by Vitalii Molokanov.

We also wanted to highlight the great artists behind this OST:
  • Composer/guitars - Vitalii Molokanov
  • Sound engineer - Danil Habibulin
  • Piano/vox - Mikhail Golyakov
  • Vox - Natal’ya Ohochinskaia
  • Sax - Artem Subichev
  • Drums - Anton Novikov
